name: Development road map
body:
### Step 1
Model dividend pathways with a flat tax _(concept from last year: [http://graph.basicincome.co](http://graph.basicincome.co))_

![dividend pathways](http://i.imgur.com/wAuJ0Jf.png)

### Step 2

Simulate and popularise the concept


### Step 3

Add dynamic taxRate governance
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
